item.title: Inventory-X: Availability simulator
item.description:
In order to simulate the availability requests and response for the product loaded in Inventory-X you will need to go to the Product tab and then select the Availability option in the Inventory-X extranet. First step will be to indicate the desired Client-Provider connection and then the hotel to search availability. After that, you should specify the following conditions: Hotel: Hotel name or ID to request for. Dates: Check-in and check-out date to request for.

item.title: Inventory-X: Delete product
item.description:
In order to delete the availability conditions and prices loaded in Inventory-X for a specific hotel, you will need to go to the Product tab and then select the Delete Product option in the Inventory-X extranet. role=“alert”> This feature is available for administrator users. Please contact your administrator in order to remove any data. role=“alert”> Important: This feature allows removing real product from our system. Remove the incorrect product may involve future product discrepancies and incorrect bookings.

item.title: Inventory-X: Permissions
item.description:
The Permissions section allows you to assign a user to different hotels or Channel Managers: Provider - User to Provider User to Hotels Provider - User to Provider From this section a user with a Provider role is given access to one or many providers/Channel Managers. In order to give permissions to a particular user, you just have to click the Add new UserProvider – Provider button. A pop up window will appear where you should select the provider which it will have access to.

item.title: Inventory-X: Booking List & Price Details
item.description:
The Booking List and Booking Price details sections allows you to retrieve and check information of bookings from a specific hotel. You can find both tools in the Product tab. Booking List Booking Price Details Booking List The Booking List tool allows you to retrieve a list of the bookings made in a particular hotel. You must introduce the client and the Channel Manager, the hotel and the filter parameters to search the bookings that meet the conditions.
